column3: Traffic Alert for Clays Mill Rd:
column4: UPDATE 5:34 p.m. - Clays Mill Rd between Pasadena Dr and Stone Rd is being reopened after being shutdown due to a serious collision.
Outbound Versailles Rd at Delmont Dr
column5: Three vehicles.  Both outbound lanes are blocked.

column4: Outbound Versailles Rd at Village Dr
column5: At least one lane is blocked.  Fire Dept on scene due to fluids on the roadway.

column4: Inner loop New Circle Rd at Russell Cave Rd
column5: The inside left turn lane is blocked.

column4: Inbound Leestown Rd at New Circle Rd
column5: The left turn lane to the inner loop entrance ramp is blocked.
